name: E-scape (Idun)
description:
Game creators:
Idun Isdrake, Natalia Balska, Martin Müller.

In progress game created for the Public Arts Garage summer course, a collaboration between Concordia University Tiohtià:ke/Montréal, Bauhaus University Weimar and Queen’s University Belfast. More info at  https://imperceptible.space/public-arts-garage/
